General.Name: High Tech Pharm Co. Ltd
General.Description: High Tech Pharm Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells injectable carbapenem antibiotics worldwide. The company's carbapenem antibiotics are used for the treatment of gram-negative bacterial infections. Its products include sterile imipenem, sterile sodium silicate, sterile imipenem- cilastatin (1: 1), aseptic meropenem, and sterile paniepenem for injection, as well as oral paropenem; and sterile erthapenem, aseptic dori penem, and aseptic via penem for injection. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Daeso-Myeon, South Korea.
